title: Someone, please help me!!!!!!!!!!

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: Guys,i have big problem,I cant play any mod,blind pick,aram,twisted treeline,nothing,i can play only custom game ! When i go on find match,i got this notification every time.Please help me,i dont know what to do,im not even 30 lvl,so i play only blind pick,but now i cant,why ?!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Your connection may have lost sync so it can't queue you up.  You should try relogging as a first step to see if that solves it.  If it continues, try the legacy client and let me know what happens:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Lemme know!

I try to logout and login again,but every time it's the same,I login on acc,select blind pick,find match,and every single time is the same.That notification is there every time,and when i try to quit,I cant...This is happend to me only on this account.And I dont want to launch Legacy client because i must wait 2 hours to patch it !

The legacy client uses the same files as the updated, so nothing should be patching.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help.  I recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to your ticket so we have more context.  We'll reply back asap!

Ok,I started legacy client and he was scan something ,when it finish,i try to play and now I can.I dont have problem anymore.It was ''I agree'' thing,couple days ago my internet connection was down so i was disconnected from the game,that was first time,so I must type I agree ,but there is no that thing in new client,so go and fix that. :)

That's a great find, thanks for the update!  Report this over to the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards so it can be looked at.  I'm glad everything is okay now, and thanks for testing!
